IP details.Name: On Chip Memory Generator
IP details.Description: On Chip Memory Generator is an IP Core with native interface. This IP Core simplifies the integration of memory elements, allowing designers to generate customized on-chip memory instances that match their specific requirements. It include the ability to configure memory size, data width, organization (e.g., single-port, dual-port), and various memory types (e.g., single-ported RAM, simple dual-port RAM and true dual port RAM).
